title: A Giro Finale for the Ages: The Masterclass, Disaster, and Puzzling Lack of Passion of the Finestre Coup
content:
What the heck happened Saturday on the Colle dell Finestre? Bobby J unpicks the historic raid and shocking standoff that decided the Giro d'Italia.

Read the full article at A Giro Finale for the Ages: The Masterclass, Disaster, and Puzzling Lack of Passion of the Finestre Coup on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
